content: Stream created by Irene Zuschlag.

New Update of APD-DK 2.0 ERRATA - please checkout:

http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Dokumentation/Errata_APD-DK-v2.0.pdf

Test documents for APD-DK can be found in draft status here:

https://svn.medcom.dk/svn/drafts/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Testprotokol/Aftale_Testprotokol_Modtagelse%20v.1.2.docx
https://svn.medcom.dk/svn/drafts/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Testprotokol/Aftale_Testprotokol_Afsendelse%20v.1.2.docx

Not all references are valid yet, the document that describes the test examples can be found here:

https://svn.medcom.dk/svn/drafts/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Eksempler/2.0/APD-DK-2.0-Testeksempler-2020_01_30.xlsx
The CDA examples are not implemented yet but an example of a minimum Appointment og maximum Appointment is here:
https://svn.medcom.dk/svn/drafts/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Eksempler/2.0/
Example DK-APD_Example_apd-2-0.xml updated and ERRATA document - typo in episodeOfCareLabel example

ERRATA document updated - typo and clarification of performer and precondition cardinality - please refer to http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Dokumentation/Errata_APD-DK-v2.0_21_02_2020.pdf
